description: The Targus Screen Protector with Bubble-Free Adhesive for Apple iPad is designed to protect the iPad from scratches and reduce the amount of fingerprints/smudges visible on the screen. Featuring a specially formulated adhesive, the protector is bubble-free, easy to install and requires no liquid or solution for installation. The Targus protector conveniently helps reduce glare for heightened visibility, making the iPad more functional while indoors or outdoors. Viewing clarity, overall brightness and touch-sensitivity of the iPad screen remain the same, providing the utmost in quality protection. Compatibility - Designed specifically for the Apple iPad Functionality - Protects screen from scratches, film surface reduces fingerprints and smudges, anti-glare for easier viewing; The easiest screen protector to apply and features bubble-free adhesive Material - Specially formulated adhesive is bubble-free; no liquids required to install; protector does not affect screen brightness or touch sensitivity RoHS Compliant **Please be advised that new Targus product should arrive in sealed retail packaging as shown in the image gallery.
title: Targus Screen Protector with Bubble-Free Adhesive for Apple iPad 16GB, 32GB, 64GB WiFi and WiFi + 3G  AWV1216US (Clear)
